lyrics.text:
Ko e ‘ofeina
Kuo nau hokosi
‘I lalo ni, hono tupu
‘O e kolōlia.

‘A e ngaahi fua,
‘Oku tāu mo e
Maama, ‘oku ‘i ‘olunga
Pea ta’engata.

Ko ia ke tau fai,
‘A e hiva lahi;
Hiva pea fai ma’u ai pē
‘O ‘ikai ke tangi.

He ‘oku tau ‘alu
‘I loto fonua
‘O hotau ‘Eiki totonu
Ko ‘Imanuela.

Ki he ngaahi maama
Matamata lelei.
‘I he potu ‘i ‘olunga
‘I he loto langi.
